content: And it's all based like I mentioned on image processing of barcodes and scanning the barcodes and -- but it's still -- that's image processing where what we want to do is continue to do the same thing, but replace the image processing technology, which is today based on scanning of barcode to replace that with our machine vision technology that would not only identify the barcode, but now look at the whole product and create a much higher confidence level in the identification, eliminate many, many millions of dollars of errors, tens of millions of dollars of errors for each of our customers by providing a better identification process and then aggregate that same data into the ERP systems, get the analytics, but it will be in real time.
